name: Pranay Aryal's biostatistics site
body:
### Final Exam Study Guide

Null
H :μ≤μ 0
H :μ≥μ 0
Alternative Test Statistic
Reference Distribution
t
Decision Rule
RejectH0 if: t>tn-1(1–α)
RejectH0 if: t < tn-1(α)
Reject H0 if: |t| > tn-1(1 − 𝛼)
P-value
P(t >t) n-1
P(t <t) n-1
2*P(|tn-1| > t)
Confidence Interval
𝑥̅±𝑡𝑛−1(1−𝛼) 𝑠 2 √𝑛
￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼H0: μ = μ0
Ha: μ ≠ μ0
